column1: Little Goat Diner////The food here is great. I had breakfast on a busy Sunday when in town and had the chicken and waffles. Also had mimosas (which were really small and expensive
column2: meh) but overall the food was inventive and delicious. It's like an American diner with Asian
column3: Mexican and comfort food influences. I am only giving four stars because the service was not all that great. The people who worked here weren't very nice and took forever to do things unfortunately. I would definitely go again though
